sentences.en: Always will we remember the character of the onslaught against us.
sentences.cn: 我们将永远记住这次对我们袭击的性质.

sentences.en: But always, let our whole nation remember the character of the onslaught against us.
sentences.cn: 我们将永远记住对我们这次袭击的性质.

sentences.en: But the new gadget onslaught seems the biggest ever.
sentences.cn: 但这种新的小玩意儿的来势似乎比以往任何时候都猛烈.

sentences.en: Can he single handedly lead a team surrounded by his offensive onslaught?
sentences.cn: 他是不能能够依靠他的进攻独自带领球队取得胜利 么 ?

sentences.en: Despite the onslaught, Palestinian militants managed to fire off rockets.
sentences.cn: 尽管如此, 巴勒斯坦的激进分子仍然发射导弹.

sentences.en: Half the regiment fell before the enemy onslaught.
sentences.cn: 在敌军猛攻下,这个团有一半人阵亡了.

sentences.en: Luckily for Britain, Angleton was able to protect us from the onslaught.
sentences.cn: 安格顿尔保护了我们, 使我们未遭受巨大灾难,这真是英国的大幸.

sentences.en: Our army tried to withstand the enemy onslaught.
sentences.cn: 我们的部队奋力抵挡敌人的猛攻.

sentences.en: plants that will survive the onslaught of winter
sentences.cn: 熬得过严冬侵袭的植物

sentences.en: The attackers launched another vicious onslaught on their victim.
sentences.cn: 袭击者再度凶残地攻击受害人。

sentences.en: The city resisted the enemy onslaught for two weeks.
sentences.cn: 这个城市反抗敌人的猛攻达两个星期之久.

sentences.en: The clash of our onslaught hurtled across the field.
sentences.cn: 我们猛攻的声音传遍战场.

sentences.en: the enemy onslaught on our military forces
The onslaught is meant to stop Hamas firing rockets at Israel.
sentences.cn: 这次猛烈攻击是为了促使哈马斯停止向以色列发射火箭.

sentences.en: The politician made a violent onslaught on the unions.
The press launched another vicious onslaught on the president.
sentences.cn: 新闻界对这位总统进行了新一轮的恶毒抨击。

sentences.en: Tom stood still, rather flustered by this onslaught.
sentences.cn: 汤姆被这一阵辱骂弄得不知所措,站着不动.

trans.tran_cn: 猛攻，攻击，突击，大量的倾泻
trans.tran_en: a large violent attack by an army
